flows.title: Quick Decision Maker Signup
flows.description: User who already knows what they want and signs up immediately after a brief scan of the homepage.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and quickly scan the main value proposition
Locate and click the prominent 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button on the homepage
Arrive at the 'Sign up form' on https://www.atob.com/get-started
Fill in required fields in the signup form
Click 'Submit Application' to proceed with the signup process

flows.title: In-Depth Product Researcher
flows.description: User meticulously explores the product features, benefits, and details before considering signup.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.atob.com
Look for a navigation link or button explicitly stating 'Fuel Cards' or 'Our Product'
Click on the link to navigate to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards
Scroll through the 'Fuel card details' page, reading about features, advantages, and potential savings
Review any FAQs or detailed specifications presented on the product page
Consider if the product meets their trucking business needs

flows.title: Cost-Focused Price Comparer
flows.description: User is primarily interested in understanding the pricing structure, fees, and potential discounts to compare with competitors.
browser_actions: Navigate to https://www.atob.com
Scan the homepage for any direct links to 'Pricing' or 'Fees' sections
If not found, click on a link leading to detailed product information, such as 'Learn More' or 'Fuel Card Details' to reach https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards
On the 'Fuel card details' page, specifically search for sections related to transaction fees, fuel discounts, monthly costs, or account setup fees
Carefully read and make note of any relevant cost-related details to compare externally

flows.title: Returning Visitor to Convert
flows.description: A user who previously visited for research and is now returning with a higher intent to complete the application process.
user_goals: Complete application they previously started or considered
Re-confirm key details before signing up
browser_actions: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com (potentially via a bookmark or recent history)
Quickly re-scan the homepage for any new information or direct calls to action
Immediately locate and click the prominent 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button, bypassing detailed browsing
Arrive at the 'Sign up form' on https://www.atob.com/get-started
Proceed to fill in or complete the signup form with full intent to submit
Click 'Submit Application' to finalize

flows.title: Mobile User Quick Scan & Action
flows.description: User accessing the site on a mobile device, performing a quick scan for key information and then taking immediate action (e.g., sign up).
user_goals: Quickly understand the service on mobile
browser_actions: Access https://www.atob.com on a mobile browser
Observe the mobile-optimized layout and prominent CTAs
Vertically scroll down the homepage to quickly scan main benefits and services
Tap on a 'Learn More' or 'Product Details' link to briefly view https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards
Quickly scroll the product page to identify a key feature or benefit on mobile
Tap the 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button (likely sticky or prominent on mobile) to navigate to https://www.atob.com/get-started
Begin filling out the signup form on their mobile device
